answers.answer: Am goin nuts over the hospital bag and the babies clothes not matchin haha
Am not stressing too but I now realise its for real so I got baby clothes washed them and am going to pack soon - by next week my bag and baby's should be ready.
By the way did you do something about GD?
I have just finished washing and drying all baby clothes.feels like a big brick off my shoulder..next im moving onto hospital bag!
Im kindda nervous!!..lol.. And this will be my 4th bby but I dnt wanna pack my hospital bag yet Idk why I jst dnt wanna do it..lol.. But I do wanna have my bby already..lol..

The diabetes counselor cant see me until Thursday, so I'm following a diet I found online, trying to drink tons and tons of water, and taking it easy (except for some light exercise). I saw my OB today and she said I'm measuring exactly right, so I'm not feeling so worried. Thanks for asking. :)

I am not panicing but my partner is! LolCouple of days ago i felt really weard.... Like something was starting.... So now he is pushing me to get everything ready. It is his first baby so i understand he is nervous :)

question: I'm a second time mom, so part of me isn't stressing about everything left to do, but the other part of me is about to panic. Feeling a little nuts.Anyone else?
title: 35 days left. nothing done
